artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Hiranoya Shinzō; Carver: Ōta Tashichi
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: bare-chested man with floral and water tattoos on his back and shoulders, wiping his neck with a cloth; 5 birds fly overhead; L2001.372.194-249 received bound into a book
markings: combined date and censor seal: 亥八改 {i hachi aratame} (Boar 8 inspected); carver\'s seal: 彫太田多七 {hori Ōta Tashichi}; publisher\'s seal: 萬町、平のや {Yorozuchō, Hiranoya}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Heroic Commoners in Kabuki (Rien kyōkaku den 梨園侠客傳)
signed: 七十八歳豊國筆 {nanajūhassai Toyokuni hitsu} (drawn by Toyokuni at the age of 78)
title: Actor Bandō Hikosaburō V as Kenkaya Gorokichi
